title: Climate Science Controversy On The Campaign Trail
teaser: Leigh Paterson of Inside Energy reports on how climate change in the classroom is playing out on the Wyoming campaign trail.
contentencoded:
Climate change is a controversial topic in this election cycle, especially when it come to teaching it in school. So far, only 12 states have adopted a new set of science education standards that include human impacts on global warming.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Leigh Paterson of Inside Energy reports on how climate change in the classroom is playing out on the Wyoming campaign trail.
